content:
I'm working on making the APIs of basic datatypes more consistent.

I'm planning on renaming List.modifyNth to just List.modify (to match Array.modify, and e.g. HashMap.modify).

I'd also like to rename List.insertNth to List.insertIdx (Generally, I don't want Nth in names and want to use Idx uniformly. e.g. compare List.eraseIdx and many others.)

I'm not sure about List.modifyNthTail. Two options are just List.modifyTail or List.modifyTailIdx.

Finally, any objections to doing whatever renames are going to happen in Batteries first, before upstreaming? (I will, of course, install deprecations for all renames.)
I strongly support making any changes where the code is right now and upstreaming unchanged
modify was subsequently moved up to Lean, and related to Array.modify, in lean#5798.
